// adijimmy
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
const int mod = 1e9+7;
#define REP(i, n) for (int i = 0; i < (int)(n); ++i)
ll power(ll a,ll b){
  ll res = 1;
  while(b){
    if(b&1) res = (res*a)%mod;
    a = (a*a)%mod;
    b >>= 1;
  }
  return res;
}
#define MAX 100005
ll degree[MAX];
int main(){
  ll n,u,v;
  scanf("%lld",&n);
  for(ll i=0;i<n-1;i++){
    scanf("%lld %lld",&u,&v);
    u--; v--;
    degree[u]++; degree[v]++;
  }
  ll res = n*(n-1)*(n-2)/6;
  res -= (n-1)*(n-2);
  for(ll i=0;i<n;i++){
	res += (degree[i]*(degree[i]-1))/2;
  }
  cout << res << endl;
  return 0;
}
